General.Name: Tellhow Sci-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Tellhow Sci-Tech Co., Ltd. provides military, emergency, and intelligent power equipment in China and internationally. It offers communication command system integration and information vehicles; satellite navigation and vehicle electronic information system products; photoelectric imaging and precision tracking and measuring products; combat command support systems; military power station and mechatronics products; military air conditioner products; ammunition and weapon systems; fuses; and rocket/missile engine charges. The company also provides energy interconnection solutions; power grid products; intelligent emergency power products; and power distribution products. In addition, it engages in the consulting, design, financing, construction, operation, and maintenance of project, including hydropower, photovoltaic and other distributed energy power stations, and power distribution systems. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.
